video_title: These Are The 3 Types Of Perfectionism @Mizkif
transcript:
there are three types of perfectionism
there's internally I want to be perfect
and I'm holding myself to my internal
standard there is sort of like an
external perfectionism where I want to
be perfect for someone else so maybe
this a better way to put it you can want
to be perfect for yourself you can want
to be perfect for someone else and
there's a third type of perfectionism
which is society expects me to be
perfect and I cannot be so this is not a
particular person this is not like I'm
doing this to make mommy or daddy happy
this is fundamentally believing that
what Society expects of me I cannot
achieve and I'm just not good enough
that is the subgroup of perfectionism
that has gone up by almost 50% so what's
happening is and this was back in like
2015 okay so something is going on where
Society is expecting us to be something
and more and more and more people are
believing that they cannot achieve it
does social media have something to do
with it certainly yeah because what's
happening is social media paints you a
picture of what your life should be even
though no one's life is actually like
that
